about_the_game:
Once upon a time, the tireless development of civilization awakened an ancient force - darkness, which left only dust from its former greatness. However, not everything was destroyed. For many centuries, a secret force has been trying to destroy the world again and again, mixing everything that exists.

You are one of the owners of an artifact made by those who foresaw such an outcome. The artifact does not allow the darkness to destroy you.

Become the one who will uncover the mystery of darkness and find a way to cope with it.


Features

  • Mine resources that burn and upgrade them to create a brighter light to help fight the darkness

  • Find the ruins of an ancient civilization and progress through the story

  • Discover new types of resources to improve tools and new crafting recipes

  • Explore mysterious caves in search of relic shards

  • Find powerful artifacts that unlock new skills

  • Clicker elements will allow you to increase the level of involvement in the game

  • Fight the darkness, it resets and transforms the world every time you go far enough

  • Transformation of the world brings variety to the game. Roguelite elements will improve the gaming experience

Crypt of Light has no microtransactions.

Internet connection required to achive offline progress and bonuses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32-bit and 64-bit operating system
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Intel graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Crypt of Light - adventure and exploration game with roguelite, clicker, and idle-game elements. Explore various biomes in the depths, mine resources, find artifacts, and discover secrets of a world where a destructive force has awakened.
